imdb.title: Kiddy Grade
imdb.plot: Two women carry out missions and fight crime across the galaxy.

episodes.title: Depusu supêsu
episodes.plot: Titled "Depth/Space", This episode introduces us to a futuristic era and two heroines of that time. Eclair, who's a very beautiful buxom 16 year with waist-length hair who wears a short micro dress. She has super human speed and strength, and her younger partner Lumiere whom has the power to control all electronic devices with her mind. The two are sent on a mission to force an evil space fleet commander to stop his blockade of a planet so they can meditate peace.

episodes.title: Taito baindo
episodes.plot: Eclair and Lumiere are assigned, along with two stuck up, heartless, female backup agents who outrank them,, to go to a space prison-ship to interrogate some inmates, but it turns out to be a trap for all 4 ladies.

episodes.title: Purizunâ esukôto
episodes.plot: Lumiere and Eclair escort a high profile killer on a military ship commanded by a bitter captain, who resents the 2 young girls assistance, but as deadly emergencies arise, he learn to like and respect them.

episodes.title: Hai supîdo
episodes.plot: Eclair is assigned to recover a stolen cyborg part that has been inserted into a woman, giving her superhuman speed. The woman, named Foxy, does not want to give it up, and another cyborg wants them both dead.

episodes.title: Dei ofu
episodes.plot: Eclair and Lumiere finally get a much-deserved day off. But their leisure plans are torn asunder when they run afoul of a plot to control the minds of the children of Aineias' ruling elite. Caught between rival underground gangs and their trigger-happy cyborgs, our favorite G.O.T.T. agents must race to save the children before it's too late?

episodes.title: Twin/Star
episodes.plot: A string of robberies take place on shuttlecrafts in a spaceport.

episodes.title: Toraiaru chairudo
episodes.plot: Young Timothy Constance is named as the heir to the Rosenfelt Financial Group, a consortium that controls the galaxy's financial capital. Eclair, Lumiere, and Armblast escort Timothy to his father's homeworld for his coronation, but there are those among the Noble classes who will go to deadly lengths to keep the reins of power out of Timothy's hands?

episodes.title: Fuobidun insutourumento
episodes.plot: Geo sort technology. It can be used for building as well as destroying planets. The planet Atoth is rich in a valuable quantum material used for E-3 Power systems. Someone has used Geo sort bomb to annihilate the planet and its people to gain control of the quantum material. Eclair and Lumiere's mission is to find out whom. Unfortunately all signs point to an inside job.

episodes.title: Mirâjyu sunea
episodes.plot: On the Planet Dardanos, a number of prominent businessmen have recently vanished without a trace. Eclair and Lumiere are sent to investigate. But with each new twist and turn in the case, they begin to realize that something sinister lurks beneath the seemingly peaceful surface of this quiet farming planet - a plot which could threaten the freedom of the entire galaxy.

episodes.title: Rebirth/Slave
episodes.plot: Eclair's suppressed memories of her past continue to invade her waking mind.

episodes.title: Set/Free
episodes.plot: Eclair and Lumière are assigned to help the the government of planet Aure break up labor protests, but when Elair sees they are shooting protesters in cold blood, she uses her super powers against the military police.

episodes.title: Frozen/Life
episodes.plot: After disobeying orders and protecting laborers on Planet Aure, Eclair, Lumiere, have to flee into deep space as their own organization (G.O.T.T) deletes their employment, and the female Chief, Eclipse, issues orders to purge (kill) them.

episodes.title: Conflict/Destiny
episodes.plot: Eclair and Lumiere seek refuge among the ruins of a war-ravaged space colony hoping to evade capture.

episodes.title: Steel/Heart
episodes.plot: On the run, Eclair and Lumiere hide on a remote planet.

episodes.title: Break/Down
episodes.plot: Coming as no surprise to Eclipse, Eclair and Lumiere stage a direct assault on GOTT Headquarters.

episodes.title: Look/Back
episodes.plot: Eclair finds herself the new Director of the ES Force.

episodes.title: Phantasm/Reborn
episodes.plot: As the new Proxy Director of the GOTT, Eclair makes policy changes.

episodes.title: Unmasked Face
episodes.plot: Director Eclair sends her vigilante force after two masked strangers.

episodes.title: Take/Revenge
episodes.plot: The true identities of the masked strangers are revealed; The clones receive an unpleasant surprise.

episodes.title: Lost/Days
episodes.plot: When Lumiere's new body can not handle the massive amount of information contained in her mind, she collapses and starts to die. Eclair searches for a way to try and save her dying partner.

episodes.title: Nouvlesse/Arc
episodes.plot: With the Atlas Project less than a day from its long-awaited completion, the galaxy joins together in celebration of the historic occasion. But beneath this festive surface lurks a dark conspiracy - one that Eclair and Lumiere will soon discover reaches to the very top of the G.O.T.T...

episodes.title: Demolition Titan
episodes.plot: G.O.T.T. Secretary Chevalier d'Autriche steals the Atlas-class intergalactic spaceship Deucalion and holds the entire planet of Aineias on the brink of destruction.

episodes.title: Annihilation/Zero
episodes.plot: Alv takes control of the Deucalion and with its power sets her sights on revenge.

episodes.title: As Time Goes by
episodes.plot: The ES Members converge on the Deucalion in hopes of stopping Alv from fulfilling her twisted desire; Eclair and Lumiere must lead the charge in the final battle
